languages.text: "Нет. Не захотел. Одно время я сам не знал, что думаю о смерти отца. Точнее — старался не думать. Не интересовался ходом дела и не искал повода вернуться в Порт Странник: все равно Арбитес не получают назначения на родные миры. Но когда я покидал Каликсис, наше судно провело на станции несколько дней, и я позволил себе прийти туда, где убили отца. Немного постоял там и…" {n}Соломон задерживает на вас взгляд.{/n} "Ничего. Я просто знал, что другой арбитр довел расследование до конца, и мне здесь нечего делать".

"No. I didn't want to. There was a time when I wasn't sure what to think of my father's death. Or rather, I tried not to think at all: I didn't look into the case, or for any other reason to go back to Port Wander — Arbitrators are never assigned to their homeworlds anyway. But when I was leaving Calixis, our ship spent several days docked at the station, and so, I permitted myself to go to the spot where my father was killed. I stood there for a while, and..." {n}Solomorne's eyes stop on you.{/n} "Nothing. I knew that another Arbitrator would already have seen the investigation through. I had nothing left to do there."
languages.original_text: "Нет. Не захотел. Одно время я сам не знал, что думаю о смерти отца. Точнее — старался не думать. languages.text: 「いいえ。そうしたくなかったんです。父の死についてどう考えればいいのか、自分でもわからなかった時期がありました。いえ、正確には、考えないようにしていました。事件を調べもしませんでしたし、ポート・ワンダーに戻る理由も探しませんでした。アービトレイターが故郷に配属されることなんて、まずありませんしね。ですが、キャリクシスを発つとき、船が数日間あのステーションに停泊しました。だから私は、父が殺された場所に行くことを自分に許しました。しばらくそこで立ち尽くして、そして…」{n}ソロモーンの視線が、あなたの上で止まった。{/n}「何もありませんでした。捜査はすでに別のアービトレイターが終えていることはわかっていました。私にできることは、もう何ひとつ残っていなかったんです」
languages.original_text: "No. I didn't want to. There was a time when I wasn't sure what to think of my father's death. Or rather, I tried not to think at all: I didn't look into the case, or for any other reason to go back to Port Wander — Arbitrators are never assigned to their homeworlds anyway. But when I was leaving Calixis, our ship spent several days docked at the station, and so, I permitted myself to go to the spot where my father was killed. I stood there for a while, and..." {n}Solomorne's eyes stop on you.{/n} "Nothing. I knew that another Arbitrator would already have seen the investigation through. I had nothing left to do there."

languages.text: "Nein. Ich wollte es gar nicht. Es gab eine Zeit, da war ich nicht sicher, was ich vom Tod meines Vaters halten sollte. Oder besser, ich habe versucht, gar nichts davon zu halten. Ich habe mir die Fallakte nicht angesehen und kehrte auch aus keinem anderen Grund nach Port Wander zurück – Arbitratoren werden ohnehin niemals auf ihre Heimatwelten versetzt. Aber als ich Calixis verließ, lag unser Schiff mehrere Tage im Dock, und so ging ich doch zu der Stelle, wo mein Vater getötet worden war. Ich stand dort eine Weile und ..." {n}Solomornes Blick ruht auf dir.{/n} "Nichts. Ich wusste, dass ein anderer Arbitrator die Untersuchung bereits abgeschlossen hatte. Für mich gab es dort nichts mehr zu tun."
languages.original_text: "No. I didn't want to. There was a time when I wasn't sure what to think of my father's death. Or rather, I tried not to think at all: I didn't look into the case, or for any other reason to go back to Port Wander — Arbitrators are never assigned to their homeworlds anyway. But when I was leaving Calixis, our ship spent several days docked at the station, and so, I permitted myself to go to the spot where my father was killed. I stood there for a while, and..." {n}Solomorne's eyes stop on you.{/n} "Nothing. I knew that another Arbitrator would already have seen the investigation through. I had nothing left to do there."

Ich habe mir die Fallakte nicht angesehen und kehrte auch aus keinem anderen Grund nach Port Wander zurück – Arbitratoren werden ohnehin niemals auf ihre Heimatwelten versetzt. Aber als ich Calixis verließ, lag unser Schiff mehrere Tage im Dock, und so ging ich doch zu der Stelle, wo mein Vater getötet worden war. Ich stand dort eine Weile und ..." {n}Solomornes Blick ruht auf dir.{/n} "Nichts. Ich wusste, dass ein anderer Arbitrator die Untersuchung bereits abgeschlossen hatte. Für mich gab es dort nichts mehr zu tun."

languages.text: « Non. Je ne le voulais pas. À une époque, je ne savais pas que penser de la mort de mon père. Ou plutôt, j'essayais de ne pas y songer : je n'ai pas cherché à consulter le dossier ni tenté de retourner à Port l'Errance. Les arbitrators ne sont jamais déployés sur leur monde d'origine, de toute manière. Mais lorsque j'ai quitté Calixis, notre vaisseau est resté à quai quelques jours dans ma station. Je me suis donc permis de me rendre dans la ruelle où mon père avait été assassiné. Une fois arrivé, je suis resté là quelques instants, et... {n}Le regard de Solomorne se pose sur vous.{/n} Et rien. Je savais qu'un autre arbitrator avait déjà inspecté la zone. Je n'avais donc plus rien à faire là. »
languages.original_text: "No. I didn't want to. There was a time when I wasn't sure what to think of my father's death. Or rather, I tried not to think at all: I didn't look into the case, or for any other reason to go back to Port Wander — Arbitrators are never assigned to their homeworlds anyway. But when I was leaving Calixis, our ship spent several days docked at the station, and so, I permitted myself to go to the spot where my father was killed. I stood there for a while, and..." {n}Solomorne's eyes stop on you.{/n} "Nothing. I knew that another Arbitrator would already have seen the investigation through. I had nothing left to do there."

traits.locale_text: « Non. Je ne le voulais pas. À une époque, je ne savais pas que penser de la mort de mon père. Ou plutôt, j'essayais de ne pas y songer : je n'ai pas cherché à consulter le dossier ni tenté de retourner à Port l'Errance. Les arbitrators ne sont jamais déployés sur leur monde d'origine, de toute manière. Mais lorsque j'ai quitté Calixis, notre vaisseau est resté à quai quelques jours dans ma station. Je me suis donc permis de me rendre dans la ruelle où mon père avait été assassiné. Une fois arrivé, je suis resté là quelques instants, et... {n}Le regard de Solomorne se pose sur vous.{/n} Et rien. Je savais qu'un autre arbitrator avait déjà inspecté la zone. Je n'avais donc plus rien à faire là. »

languages.text: «No. Tampoco quise hacerlo. Hubo una época en la que no tenía claro qué pensar de la muerte de mi padre. O más bien procuraba no pensar en ella para nada: no me interesé por el caso ni busqué algún pretexto para visitar Puerto Vagabundo. De todos modos, a los Arbitrator nunca les asignan sus mundos natales. Pero cuando me marchaba de Calixis nuestra nave pasó varios días atracada en la estación, así que me permití visitar el lugar donde mataron a mi padre. Estuve allí durante un rato, y...». {n}Solomorne posa los ojos sobre ti.{/n} «Nada. Sabía que otro Arbitrator ya había investigado aquel caso a fondo. No tenía nada más que hacer allí».
languages.original_text: "No. I didn't want to. There was a time when I wasn't sure what to think of my father's death. Or rather, I tried not to think at all: I didn't look into the case, or for any other reason to go back to Port Wander — Arbitrators are never assigned to their homeworlds anyway. But when I was leaving Calixis, our ship spent several days docked at the station, and so, I permitted myself to go to the spot where my father was killed. I stood there for a while, and..." {n}Solomorne's eyes stop on you.{/n} "Nothing. I knew that another Arbitrator would already have seen the investigation through. I had nothing left to do there."

De todos modos, a los Arbitrator nunca les asignan sus mundos natales. Pero cuando me marchaba de Calixis nuestra nave pasó varios días atracada en la estación, así que me permití visitar el lugar donde mataron a mi padre. Estuve allí durante un rato, y...». {n}Solomorne posa los ojos sobre ti.{/n} «Nada. Sabía que otro Arbitrator ya había investigado aquel caso a fondo. No tenía nada más que hacer allí».

languages.text: “没有，我并不想复仇。之前有那么一段时间，我不知道该如何看待父亲殉职的事情。或者，更确切地说，我尽量不去想那些事情。我没参加那个案子的调查，也没有其他返回漫游港的理由，毕竟法务官是绝对不会被分配到故乡任职的。不过，当我离开卡利西斯的时候，我们的船在漫游港停了几天，于是我去了趟父亲被害死的地方。我在那里站了一会儿，然后……”{n}索罗蒙的目光停在了你身上。{/n}“然后就没什么了。我知道另一位法务官已经完成了调查工作，我已经没什么能做的事情了。”
languages.original_text: "No. I didn't want to. There was a time when I wasn't sure what to think of my father's death. Or rather, I tried not to think at all: I didn't look into the case, or for any other reason to go back to Port Wander — Arbitrators are never assigned to their homeworlds anyway. But when I was leaving Calixis, our ship spent several days docked at the station, and so, I permitted myself to go to the spot where my father was killed. I stood there for a while, and..." {n}Solomorne's eyes stop on you.{/n} "Nothing. I knew that another Arbitrator would already have seen the investigation through. I had nothing left to do there."

traits.locale_text: “没有，我并不想复仇。之前有那么一段时间，我不知道该如何看待父亲殉职的事情。或者，更确切地说，我尽量不去想那些事情。我没参加那个案子的调查，也没有其他返回漫游港的理由，毕竟法务官是绝对不会被分配到故乡任职的。不过，当我离开卡利西斯的时候，我们的船在漫游港停了几天，于是我去了趟父亲被害死的地方。我在那里站了一会儿，然后……”{n}索罗蒙的目光停在了你身上。{/n}“然后就没什么了。我知道另一位法务官已经完成了调查工作，我已经没什么能做的事情了。”

languages.text: "Hayır, almak da istememiştim. Bir süre babamın ölümü hakkında ne düşüneceğimi, nasıl hissedeceğimi bilemedim. Daha doğrusu babamın ölümünü düşünmemeye çalıştım. Davaya bakmadım ya da Irak Liman'a geri dönmek için başka bir neden bulmaya çalışmadım. Yargıcılar zaten hiçbir zaman ana yurtlarına atanmaz. Ancak Calixis'ten ayrılırken gemimiz istasyonda birkaç gün kalınca bu süre zarfında babamın öldürüldüğü yere gitmeyi kendime reva gördüm. Orada bir süre öylece durdum ve..." {n}Solomorne, gözlerini senden ayırmıyor.{/n} "Hiçbir şey yapmadım. Başka bir Yargıcı'nın soruşturmayı çoktan tamamlamış olduğuna emindim. Benim yapabileceğim bir şey kalmamıştı."
languages.original_text: "No. I didn't want to. There was a time when I wasn't sure what to think of my father's death. Or rather, I tried not to think at all: I didn't look into the case, or for any other reason to go back to Port Wander — Arbitrators are never assigned to their homeworlds anyway. But when I was leaving Calixis, our ship spent several days docked at the station, and so, I permitted myself to go to the spot where my father was killed. I stood there for a while, and..." {n}Solomorne's eyes stop on you.{/n} "Nothing. I knew that another Arbitrator would already have seen the investigation through. I had nothing left to do there."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır, almak da istememiştim. Bir süre babamın ölümü hakkında ne düşüneceğimi, nasıl hissedeceğimi bilemedim. Daha doğrusu, babamın ölümünü hiç düşünmemeye çalıştım. Davaya bakmadım ya da Irak Liman'a geri dönmek için başka bir neden bulmaya çalışmadım. Yargıcılar zaten hiçbir zaman ana yurtlarına atanmazlar. Ancak Calixis'ten ayrılırken gemimiz istasyonda birkaç gün kaldı ve bu süre zarfında babamın öldürüldüğü yere gitmeyi kendime reva gördüm. Orada bir süre öylece durdum ve..." {n}Solomorne'un gözleri senin üzerinde duruyor.{/n} "Hiçbir şey yapmadım. Başka bir Yargıcı'nın soruşturmayı çoktan tamamlamış olduğuna emindim. Benim yapabileceğim bir şey kalmamıştı."
